title: How to get scholarship for my masters in Europe for non-EU student - Quora
tags: College and University Scholarship and Fellowships

response.answer_text: Europe offers two options, one is free education eg. Germany, Italy, finland Norway , Austria- where entire education is free, and you are not supposed to pay any tuition fees, however requirements are high and there is stiff competition for seats, keep 5–6 options in hand when you apply, on other side , many countries such as czech, latvia, lithuania, hungary, czech low budget options with fees starting 2000 euro per year. let me know if you need any more information.
Yes. Use my top secret database Google
